text: Ke kaloku (umfazi) lowo wayehlala emzini wakhe, wafuna ukumhenda, wavala iingcango, akugqiba wathi: “Khawuze wethu.” Wathi yena: “Ndicela ukhuseleko ngoAllâh! Inene indoda yakho yinkosi yam! Yenze ukuhlala kwam apha kwalulonwabo olukhulu (ke andingekhe ndiyiphoxe) kuba inene abenzi bobubi abasokuze baphumelele.”
